What a heartfelt movie ..... This is one of those movies that really melt your heart It s about a man who just loves his wife and would fight for her every step of the way. This movie is about an interracial couple that fights for their rights in the 1950 s. The direction by Jeff Nichols and the way he lights and frames every shot is beautiful The warm red looking cinematography is a reflection of the love that Richard and Mildred Loving have for each other. Joel Edgerton and Ruth Negga are fantastic in their roles They are very subtle in their performances You can feel that these were two people that loved each other and wanted nothing more than that. They just want to go about their everyday lives Building bricks cooking just live the lives of a normal couple But because they live in Southern Virginia things don t go quite smoothly. Nick Kroll as their lawyer I thought was an interesting casting choice too He brought a comedic sensibility to a situation that had a lot of racial tension. Lastly what will a Jeff Nichols movie without Michael Shannon ??. This is everything I love about biopics It s a story that we don t really know too well about that is told in an emotional and heartfelt way Henderson the title Loving ".. It s sort of odd to say this but I think this would make a perfect date movie.
